data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Borkou, Chad. Please, stir the 7,810 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Borkou, Chad
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 7,810 believers in Borkou to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 99,490 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Borkou, Chad.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, let those from the 7,810 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Borkou.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Tubu, Teda people might believe through him.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Borkou, Chad. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Borkou prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Borkou, Chad.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
